A wagon ahead has overturnedIt appears to have been carrying four large metal containers that are now scattered aboutThe driver lies dead, some wicked pustules marking his exposed skinOne of the containers looks like it might be leaking some sort of liquid.
Una vieja caba√±a de piedra, cubierta de arbustos y hierba de cangrejo, parece robusta pero abandonada.
Un gigante se encuentra al borde de la carretera ayudando a los transe√∫ntes a superar un reciente desprendimiento de rocas por un m√≥dico precio.
The group comes to a wilderness trading post on the trailThe cantankerous oldtimer who runs it offers a bounty for scalps.
Un enigm√°tico par de monjes que se niegan a reconocer a los PC.
Traveling off the main road, the PCs feel like they are being followedWho is hunting them?
Un asesino herido necesita un lugar donde recuperar fuerzas antes de seguir su camino.
Una gruesa cuerda yace en el suelo al otro lado del camino.
Three types of meat hang on a spit over a campfire in a makeshift campYou try to convince yourself that it is indeed animal and not humanoid that sits above the open flames.
La carretera nevada esconde un sumidero derrumbado que depositar√° al grupo en un tobog√°n de slalom por la ladera de una monta√±a, con un recorrido que atraviesa grandes afloramientos puntiagudos.

A rider stops to ask for hurried directionsThe rider thanks them and races aheadWhen the PCs reach the next town, fresh Wanted posters are being nailed up with the group's faces sketched on and accusations of heinous crimes in the last town backThe locals all stare at the PCs.
A well-spoken bugbear wearing fine studded leather armour is trapped under a fallen treeHe implores the party to come to his aid.
En un r√≠o con vado ligeramente sumergido, un cartel dice "Ware the Greenteeth".
Una interminable manada de animales pasta en medio de la carretera.
A weathered obelisk sits by the side of the pathSomeone has recently carved a message into it in an ancient script.
Unas rocas afiladas se han desprendido de un acantilado y han ca√≠do sobre la carretera.
En las cercan√≠as opera una explotaci√≥n forestal o minera ilegal.
Esp√≠as una gallina en un lado de la carretera, mirando con desconfianza al otro lado.
Una mina terrestre acecha a los PC.

A ranger stops by the group's camp one night and gives them advice on the trail ahead, places to camp and a tavern where they can get good rates if they mention his nameAll his advice is good, but when they mention his name at the tavern, they're told he died years ago on that very road.
La lista de la compra de pociones est√° en el suelo.
The King has enacted a toll bridgeSeveral peasants were unaware, and cannot afford the tollThey accost the PCs demanding then begging for change.

The road leads you to an icy arch traversing a deep chasm whose vertical faces dive down so far below you cannot see where they convergeThe slick surface and stiff wind present a tricky challenge to your footing
Las monedas dispersas de una tierra que no reconoces brillan dentro de los restos rotos de una bolsa.

On a bridge, the PCs hear the roar of water much louder than the river they crossThen the river level dropsSounds of combat upstream reach the PCs' earsAt the battle site, mercenaries are trying to capture a water elementalThe elemental is good-aligned and will appeal to the party for helpThe mercenaries, if aided, will not split their bounty from the wizard who hired themThe elemental, if rescued, will reward the party with random treasures from the river bottom, but the PCs acquire the enmity of the wizard who posted the bounty.
A wizard rushes up to the PCs, running faster than a horseThe spell runs out soon, and he'd like company until his magic has been replenished.
Una banda de ni√±os, hambrientos y cansados, que afirman fervientemente estar en una cruzada a Tierra Santa.
El cad√°ver de un gigante decapitado yace al otro lado del camino, bloque√°ndolo.
A bare-knuckle fight in a dusty ring on the roadsideCrowd size?
The party starts finding neatly severed body parts discarded on the roadAn ear, then a finger, then a tongue.
It is known this road leads straight to the next village with no side pathsNevertheless, the road forksA well-dressed attendant offers his counsel on which path to take.

Outside the entrance to a silver mine, a group of protesters wave signs and shout racial slurs about dwarves stealing human jobsAs you watch, a group of dwarves entering the mine is set upon by some of the protestors.
Una docena de flechas llueven en el camino desde una gran distancia delante del grupo.
Miles de murci√©lagos surcan el cielo mientras el sol se pierde de vista.
Una urraca nidificante se abalanza sobre la fiesta.
Alongside a busy road, an enterprising merchant has set up a small casinoDice and cards are available, but does the merchant have a gambling license?
A mechanized vehicle spews smoke from a large funnel and makes a hell of a racketIt diverts its course and increases speed when its occupants notice the party.
The street is strangely desertedNot a soul walks the pavements and litter swirls in the breezeAn unmanned cart with squeaky wheels rolls onto the street.
A weathered old woman offers her camp to travelers, and a free mealLooks like your lucky day.
The party hears a long stream of invectives from further up the roadThen they spot a head upon the road - a person still alive, buried up to his neck.
El camino est√° plagado de hojas ca√≠das que cubren una nueva trampa de foso.
Un cad√°ver de oso bloquea la carretera.
Un peque√±o y tosco letrero con "Natural Hot Springs" escrito a mano con carb√≥n apunta al este.
Una familia de granjeros recibe a todos los viajeros con alojamiento gratuito en los establos.
Un ej√©rcito de muertos vivientes marcha por el camino.
Un chorro de lluvia primaveral sonr√≠e hoy a los agricultores.
Un drag√≥n vuela por el cielo.
Un animal centinela, como un p√°jaro, un perro o un roedor, da la alarma.
Two men exchange blows in the distanceEach accuses the other of stealing a family heirloom.
Un humanoide muerto al lado de la carretera con un cuchillo en la espalda.
Un hombre golpea a un burro con una rama y le grita: "¬°Mu√©vete, pedazo de cebo de cuervo picado por las pulgas!".
The road is blocked by guards searching for violent criminalsDo the PCs look like the escaped convicts?
A work gang labors to resurface the roadway under the watchful eye of the lawThe arrival of travelers gives some of the work gang members the distraction they need to make a break for freedom.
Saltar por encima de estos charcos ser√≠a una tarea mucho m√°s f√°cil si la carretera no atravesara un paisaje pantanoso.
Una hilera de tumbas reci√©n cavadas se alinean al lado de la carretera, exactamente el mismo n√∫mero que el partido.
Al lado de la carretera te encuentras con una larga hilera de rosas... ¬øte paras a olerlas?
A parasitic dimensional traveler accompanies the PCs until attaching to one and sucking his life outAny attempt to remove the traveler will harm the character he is attached to.
Un vendedor ambulante ofrece a los PC una bola de cristal con un gran descuento.
A bounty hunter with a prisoner would like to join the PCs until the next townThe prisoner likes the opportunities this brings.
Una flecha golpea un tronco cercano, un mensaje envuelto en el asta.
Un carro aparentemente vac√≠o se precipita colina abajo hacia ti.
Un famoso bardo y su bullicioso s√©quito pasan en un carruaje de dos caballos.
Un grupo transporta el cuerpo de una persona importante a otro lugar para su entierro.
The road stops at the jagged hole of a collapsed mine shaftSomething glints in the shadows.
Un bardo gordo y borracho canta alabanzas a los dioses.
The long mountain road leads to a tunnelAs it progresses deeper into the rock, it grows wider and develops a flagstone surfaceAt length, it emerges unexpectedly into an underground city.

A group of much more powerful adventurers meet the party on the road, heading back from a nearby dungeonThey brag about the monsters they slew and loot they found there, and say there's probably a few scraps left behind that weren't worth their time to pick up, if the group hurries.
Beneath the shade of a lone tree sits a messenger boyHe's exhausted and will tell every passerby he is re-considering whether he's in the right line of work.
Whoo-eeeeh, what is that? A terrible stench fills the airThe PCs must roll below their Constitution score or vomitDead bodies, a dead monster, whatever you wish, lie rotting in the bushes.

A cat wanders into the party's campIt does not meowIt will eat if offered food, and may show appreciation with a little rub, but otherwise stays out of the wayIt will follow the party for a few miles, and if ignored, it will leave.
Justo al lado de la carretera, unos petates rodean un caldero burbujeante sobre una hoguera encendida, pero no hay nadie a la vista.

Workmen replace a wooden bridge with a stone oneThe detour is a day or more out of the wayThe workers have finished a narrow path of stone, and might be convinced or bribed to allow you to balance your way across the precarious ledgeWatch your step.
Una rueda se rompe o se desprende de su vag√≥n.
Tu grupo escucha un ruido de armas y animados improperios antes de doblar una curva y encontrar a dos hombres bati√©ndose en duelo en la calzada.
An elderly man sits patiently beside the road with a folding chess setHe invites the PCs to stop, rest and play chess for a while in the shade.
A unit of archers are out practicing their shots on the King's HighwayBeware stray arrows.
Several sets of footprints are still visible from what appears to be a struggle from the night before
Un cartel que dice animales ex√≥ticos se√±ala un camino fuera de la carretera principal.
A bridge is missingWhere it used to be is now a ferry service, for a sizable feeThe ferry looks like it might consist of bridge parts, and only takes a few travelers at a time.
Un molesto bardo insiste en unirse a la fiesta.
Un loro parlanch√≠n e inteligente trata de persuadir al grupo para que lo lleve a un druida cercano que puede convertirlo en la persona que era.
Crucified men line the road for the next mileOne of them is still alive.
Un hombre se balancea desde una rama y proclama ser el dios de la previsibilidad.
Una nube con forma de s√≠mbolo sagrado se pierde de vista.

A startled and disheveled merchant approaches and warns you to be careful of the road up aheadHe tells you a large number of locals have taken to harassing and, in some cases, robbing all who travel the new road that bypasses their townApparently, they are upset about the dwindling trade from people bypassing their town and have decided to take matters into their own hands.
A friendly rabbit is actually a polymorphed princess from a far away landShe asks for help.
Cloying, wet mist makes fires difficult to start, papers soggy, bows unreliable, sword handles slipperyIt also puts everyone in a sour mood.

A huge crevasse splits the road in front of youA rider sits on a horse across the crevasse and calls out to you in an accent: So, the marquis sent someone after allThrow the ransom across now or he'll never see his precious daughter again!√ì

A woman cries for help as she weeps over her husband's bodyHowever, when you approach, a band of thieves spring from their hiding place and advance towards youIt is then, to your dismay, you notice the woman and her "dead" husband have drawn long daggers and are also advancing.
Una voz desde los arbustos junto al camino grita: "¬°Te tenemos rodeado, Torvik! Tu villan√≠a termina aqu√≠". ¬øPero qui√©n es Torvik?
Un carro de pago que se dirige a un ej√©rcito cercano pasa a trompicones, sin suficientes guardias para desafiar al grupo.
Alguien toca las gaitas m√°s adelante.

table.name: Item Properties
table.caption: Item Properties
rows: Attached
Attached to gauntlet or armor, leaving hand free.
Bonded
Weapon only usable by owner, cannot be removed from person without consent.
Breaking
Can be used to target and break objects at no disadvantage.
Concealable
Can be hidden from view.
Concussive
Creates a burst of sound or light on impact to deafen/blind/temporarily stun.
Deadly
Each upgrade increase attack die (up to d10).
Elemental: Air
Has properties related to air (e.gcan subtly manipulate winds, harness electricity).
Elemental: Earth
Has properties related to earth (e.gbenefits to mining).
Elemental: Fire
Has properties related to fire (e.gproduces heat/light, can cause burning).
Elemental: Metal
Has properties related to metal (e.gbenefits to blacksmithing).
Elemental: Water
Has properties related to water (e.gcan extinguish fires).
Elemental: Wood
Has properties related to wood/plants (e.gbenefits to gardening, nature traversal).
Flexible
Whip or whip-like; Range (close), AoE (close), Stunning (binding), Unwieldy (-2 AB).
Focused Area
AoE can be focused in a line, cone, etcEach upgrade allows a different option.
Focused Damage
AoE can be focused to only target specific creatures or objectsEach upgrade allows greater flexibility.
Impacting
Each upgrade increases range of knockback (close, short, medium, long).
Magical
Has general magical properties.
Masterwork
+1 attack or damage bonus. (Doubles Base Mundane value)
Penetrating
Ignore armorWith second upgrade, ignore shieldsAC otherwise still applies.
Poisonous
Can cause poisoning.
Ranged
Each upgrade increases range starting at short (short, medium, long).
Reach
Can be used at close range or thrown at no disadvantage.
Rending
Serration or other features cause sustained wounds and mutilation.
Siege
Can be used to break open structures.
Silenced
The weapon produces little to no sound on projection or impact.
Spellbreaking
Can silence spells/spellcasters on successful attack.
Stunning
Can be used non-lethally to incapacitate at no disadvantage.
Suppressing
Creates an obstacle to those in weapon range-2 AB to anyone in range.
Unique Appearance
May be a well known item or associated with a well-known person or faction.

table.name: Alchemy Results
table.caption: Alchemical Mishaps
rows: {@item You are able to speak 1 additional language for 5 days}
{@item You can jump 4 times as high as normal and falling damage you take is quartered for 24 hours}
{@item You grow one size category larger for 5 days}
{@item You grow feathers all over your body that last for 10 days}
{@item You grow a controllable prehensile tail that lasts for 10 days}
{@item You grow scales all over your body that last for 10 days}
{@item You gain an erection lasting more than 4 hours}
{@item You grow a long ginger beard that lasts for 10 days}
{@item You shed bright light in a 30 foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 foot radius beyond that for 10 days}
{@item The potion also contains a water elemental that will appear in an area adjacent to you after the next physical activity you engage in}
{@item You grow a third eye in your forehead that grants + 2 to perception checks that rely on sight that lasts for 10 days}
{@item Your sweat becomes sticky and you can climb along vertical surfaces and ceilings using your hands for 24 hours}
{@item The potion is a Shit Scrying potion in addition to its expected outcome}
{@item You regain your lowest expended spell slot}
{@item You erupt into flames, taking 1d6 fire damage per round until extinguished}
{@item You can see any creature that is invisible for 10 minutes}
{@item Your age changes by 1d20 years, odd is younger, even is older}
{@item Every hair on your body falls out}
{@item You pee fire for the next 24 hours}
{@item The potion also contains a fire elemental that will appear in an area adjacent to you after you next fall asleep}
{@item You shrink one size category smaller for 10 days}
{@item The potion also induces level 1 barbarian rage when consumed for 1 minute}
{@item You and anything you are wearing or carrying becomes invisible for 1 minute}
{@item Your skin turns a vibrant color, roll 1d8 to determine, rerolling 8's}
{@item You grow an additional pair of arms on your torso for 24 hours (DM's control)}
{@item The potion is also extremely alcoholic in addition to its normal effects}
{@item You gain the ability to telepathically communicate with any creature you can see within 30 feet of you}
{@item You gain resistance to fire damage and can cast the 1st level spell Burning Hands (DC 15) at will, without using a spell slot or any components for 1 hour}
{@item You gain resistance to lightning and thunder damage and can cast the 1st level spell Thunderwave (DC 15) at will, without using a spell slot or any components for 1 hour}
{@item You gain resistance to cold damage and can cast the 1st level spell Ice Knife (DC 15) at will, without using a spell slot or any components for 1 hour}
{@item You feel sharper and see 1 second into the future and you gain proficiency in Acrobatics for 10 days}
{@item You smell sweet like flowers or honey and you gain proficiency in Animal Handling for 10 days}
{@item You feel an attunement to the weave and you gain proficiency in Arcana for 10 days}
{@item Your muscles ripple with strength and you gain proficiency in Athletics for 10 days}
{@item Your tongue turns to silver and you gain proficiency in Deception for 10 days}
{@item You gain the experience of many lives before and you gain proficiency in History for 10 days}
{@item You gain the ability to tell when someone is lying and you gain proficiency in Insight for 10 days}
{@item You acquire a resting bitch face and you gain proficiency in Intimidation for 10 days}
{@item Any clothing or armor you wear turns into a long waterproof trench coat with loafers and you appear to be wearing a bowlers cap and you gain proficiency in Investigation for 10 days}
{@item Whenever you speak you begin with the phrase "What is the nature of your medical emergency?" and you gain proficiency in Medicine for 10 days}
{@item You acquire long, greasy and unkempt hair and beard, smell like the dankest nugs, and gain proficiency in Nature for 10 days}
{@item Your eyes double in size and you gain proficiency in Perception for 10 days}
{@item Your voice becomes that of an angel and you can't help but speak in rhymes or song and you gain proficiency in Performance for 10 days}
{@item Your tongue turns to gold and you gain proficiency in Persuasion for 10 days}
{@item You are enshrined in a soft golden light and you gain proficiency in Religion for 10 days}
{@item You grow an extra finger on each hand and you gain proficiency in Sleight of Hand for 10 days}
{@item Your footsteps make no sound and you gain proficiency in Stealth for 10 days}
{@item You always know which way is North as well as the direction of the nearest source of fresh water and you gain proficiency in Survival for 10 days}
{@item The potion causes your skin to harden and you gain resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage for 1 hour}
{@item The potion causes you to levitate 6 inches off the ground for 1 hour}
